description.en: During the course students participate in the Worlds biggest synthetic biology competion - iGEM. Participants will get experience in every step of scientific research, from hypothesis to analysis of results, from searching for sponsors to engaging general public in science. Students would learn how to work both independently and in a team. They improve their lab working skills, communacation skills, teamwork skills, learn how resaerch is done in the real-life conditions. The course end with the international conference where students present the resuls of their work.
description.et: Kursuse raames osalevad tudengid suurimas rahvusvahelises sünteetilise bioloogia võistluses iGEM. iGEMi jooksul saavad üliõpilased kastetada igast teadustööga seotud rolli: töötada laboris, kommunikeerida ja teha koostööd teiste teadlastega, populariseerida teadust, otsida rahandust, avaldada saadud tulemusi, esitada neid teaduskonferentsil.

objectives.en: The goal is to introduce the students to the scientific process, to try a researcher's role, planning of experiments, and critical reading of scientific literature; develop learning skills. Additionally the goal is to develop the ability to plan, to do and to present the research of different specialty field. Student gets the opportunity to be in the role of researcher. Participant learns to plan working time, arrnages meetings with supervisor(s), selects the most suitable research topic, gets experience and better understanding of the research work. Student learns how to study independently. Overall, the course help students improve the chances to find a good job after graduation.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on arendada tudengi õpimisoskust, lisaks anda võimalust tudengile proovida ennast teadustöötaja rollis. Õpetada plaaneerima oma aega, leppima kokku aja ja tegevusplaani projekti juhandajaga, valima endale sobivat uurimisteemat, töötada iseseisvalt. Eesmärk anda kursuse läbinud üliõpilasele ettekujutuse eksperimentaalse teadustöö iseloomust ja anda eelistuse tulevikus töö otsimisel peale ülikooli lõpetamist (tudeng omab eriala praktika kogemust).

learning_outcomes.en: 1) knows how to find necessary information in the scientific literature;
2) is able to plan the working time;
3) is able to work in the lab both independently and in a team;
learning_outcomes.et: 3)	Oskab töötada laboris iseseisvalt ja meeskonna koosseisus;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) is able to organise  scientific public event;
learning_outcomes.et: 4)	Oskab organiseerida ja läbi viia teaduspopulariseerime üritust;

learning_outcomes.en: 5) is able to analyse the results of the experiments;
6) is able to write scientific texts;
7) is able to present the results of the work on the scientific conference;
8) is able to find funding for the project;
9) is able to design and program website that contain all the information about the project;
learning_outcomes.et: 9)	Oskab disainida ja programeerida veebilehekülge, kus on olemas kogu projekti info;

learning_outcomes.en: 10) is able to cooperate with the other scientists and experts in the field;
learning_outcomes.et: 10)	Oskab kommunitseerida teiste teadlastega ja organiseerida koostööd;

learning_outcomes.en: 11) has aquired the most up-to-date information and experience about the field of study, which enables to make the consent career desicion.
learning_outcomes.et: 11)	On saanud parima ettekujutust teadustöö spetsifiikast, mis võimaldab teha kaalutud karjääri valikut.

independent_work.et: Students have to come up with idea how to change the world with the help of synthetic biology; work in the lab to create synthetic biology system, engage and educate general audience. Selected students will go to Boston, USA and present the project during annual Giant Jamboree (oral presentation and poster sessions).

description.et: complete and present a project. participation in iGem competition.

grade_preconditions.et:
Active participation in the project. 
Lab work
Human practices
wiki page

grade_evaluation.et:
creation of idea 25%
Lab work 25%
Human practices 25%
wiki page 25%
